comment_to_pluto_devs: README! hello! this file is for a special purpose: some of the notebooks from this repository are also featured Pluto notebooks (they show in the main menu of Pluto, see https://github.com/fonsp/Pluto.jl/pull/2927). More specifically, the site plutojl.org acts as a 'featured source' of pluto, search for plutojl.org in https://github.com/fonsp/Pluto.jl/blob/main/frontend/featured_sources.js . That means: this file does not configure this website plutojl.org
title: Pluto documentation highlights
description: We are working on brand-new documentation at plutojl.org/en/docs - here are some highlights!

collections.title: Advanced widgets
collections.description: This is how you can use Pluto's special features to make bespoke interactive widgets! Go to plutojl.org/en/docs to learn more.
